	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = scheme
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 11
				}
				# Dom Blowjob
				# You pull away and look up, preparing for him to mark your face.\n
				desc = sex_transition_11
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 17
				}
				# Sub Blowjob
				# You don't resist when he pulls out and aims his rod at your face.\n
				desc = sex_transition_17
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10006
				}
				# 6: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.HANDJOB failed
				# The potent musk of his member, inflated by the proximity of your nose to his groin, strangely captivates you and you lose this opportunity to assert more dominance.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10006
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10007
				}
				# 7: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# The incessant invasion of his member down your throat momentarily puts you in a trance, leaving the initiative in his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10007
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10009
				}
				# 9: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_RUINED_ORGASM failed
				# As you try to pull back, he holds the back of your head with his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10009
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10012
				}
				# 12: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# Putting both hands on his waist, you attempt to curb his thrusts. However, on your knees beneath him, you don't have enough leverage to forcefully stop him and he seems to have no intention of letting you back in control.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10012
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10015
				}
				# 15: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND failed
				# Try as you might, [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] stops you from pulling away.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10015
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 4
			}
			# defaulted to 11: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_ON_FACE
			desc = sex_transition_11
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 6
			}
			# defaulted to 17: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_ON_FACE
			desc = sex_transition_17
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.3.desc.0
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom <= -20
			}
			desc = LIDAc.3.desc.1
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom > 10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.3.desc.2
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -2
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 15
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 15
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.81
	}
}
LIDAc.2 = {
	# BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_DOM: Satisfying your Sweet Tooth
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.2.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = disgust
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = schadenfreude
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10
				}
				# Dom Blowjob
				# You prepare to wring him dry with your dexterous tongue.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10006
				}
				# 6: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.HANDJOB failed
				# The potent musk of his member, inflated by the proximity of your nose to his groin, strangely captivates you and you lose this opportunity to assert more dominance.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10006
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10007
				}
				# 7: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# The incessant invasion of his member down your throat momentarily puts you in a trance, leaving the initiative in his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10007
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10009
				}
				# 9: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_RUINED_ORGASM failed
				# As you try to pull back, he holds the back of your head with his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10009
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 4
			}
			# defaulted to 10: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_DOM
			desc = sex_transition_10
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.2.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 10
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 10
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.82
	}
}

		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = shame
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = schadenfreude
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 16
				}
				# Sub Blowjob
				# You don't resist when he plunges into your mouth to deposit his seed.\n
				desc = sex_transition_16
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 20
				}
				# Deepthroat
				# You don't have any say in it, or in anything else at the moment, as his mass fills your throat.\n
				desc = sex_transition_20
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10012
				}
				# 12: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# Putting both hands on his waist, you attempt to curb his thrusts. However, on your knees beneath him, you don't have enough leverage to forcefully stop him and he seems to have no intention of letting you back in control.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10012
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10015
				}
				# 15: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND failed
				# Try as you might, [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] stops you from pulling away.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10015
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10018
				}
				# 18: EventsSex.DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB failed
				# Putting both hands on his waist, you push and try to stop his thrusts. It's all in vain, however, as he ignores you.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10018
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 6
			}
			# defaulted to 16: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
			desc = sex_transition_16
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 7
			}
			# defaulted to 20: EventsSex.DEEPTHROAT -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
			desc = sex_transition_20
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.6.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -2
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0

			DRAMA = yes

			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 20
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.83
	}

	# BLOWJOB_RUINED_ORGASM: A Firm Grasp on His Release
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.4.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {

		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {

		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {

		}

	}
	override_background = {

		}

		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = dismissal
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = beg
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 9
				}
				# Dom Blowjob
				# You pull back and slap his rod, disrupting the build up to his climax.\n
				desc = sex_transition_9
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10006
				}
				# 6: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.HANDJOB failed
				# The potent musk of his member, inflated by the proximity of your nose to his groin, strangely captivates you and you lose this opportunity to assert more dominance.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10006
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10007
				}
				# 7: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# The incessant invasion of his member down your throat momentarily puts you in a trance, leaving the initiative in his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10007
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10009
				}
				# 9: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_RUINED_ORGASM failed
				# As you try to pull back, he holds the back of your head with his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10009
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 4
			}
			# defaulted to 9: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_RUINED_ORGASM
			desc = sex_transition_9
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.4.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 2
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 35
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 35
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.84
	}
}
LIDAc.7 = {
	# PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS: More Icing on the Cake

	theme = seduction

		}
		event_background = battlefield

				# You attempt to push him to the ground with your body, but are met with pleasure as [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] gets up, running his rod along your crack while holding you tightly.\n

			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10054
				}
				# 54: EventsSex.HOTDOG_ON_TOP -> EventsCum.ASS_TEASE_CUM_ON_ASS failed
				# You try to guide his stream to land on your buns, but he is climaxing too hard to control\n
				desc = sex_transition_10054
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 2
			}
			# defaulted to 25: EventsSex.ASS_TEASE -> EventsCum.CUM_ON_GROIN
			desc = sex_transition_25
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 10
			}
			# defaulted to 30: EventsSex.ASS_RUB -> EventsCum.CUM_ON_GROIN
			desc = sex_transition_30
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 8
			}
			# defaulted to 38: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsCum.CUM_ON_GROIN
			desc = sex_transition_38
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 9
			}
			# defaulted to 44: EventsSex.STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsCum.CUM_ON_GROIN
			desc = sex_transition_44
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 11
			}
			# defaulted to 55: EventsSex.HOTDOG_ON_TOP -> EventsCum.CUM_ON_GROIN
			desc = sex_transition_55
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.12.desc.0
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAc.12.desc.1
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom
			}
			desc = LIDAc.12.desc.2
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0.3
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 5
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 5
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.86
	}
}

			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}

		character = root
		animation = worry
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = personality_bold
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}

		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition

				}

				# Feeling little resistance, he prepares to leave you a hot, sticky gift.\n

					scope:sex_transition = 62

			}

			}

				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10049
				}
				# 49: EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsCum.PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS failed

					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10056

				# You try to continue riding him, but as you slow down a moment he grabs you arms and pushes your waist forward. You nearly topple before feeling a burst of pleasure as [affairs_partner.GetFirstName]'s cock enters you.\n

			}

				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10060
				}

			}

				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000

			}

	# CREAMPIE_BRED: Tightly Packed
	type = character_event

	theme = seduction
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}

		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}

		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {

		}

	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = feast

	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = market

	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {

		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room

		character = root
		animation = worry

			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = personality_bold
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 73
				}
				# Lie on Your Back
				# His rod gets even harder as his relentless pounding reaches your deepest spot, your mind #bold overwhelmed#! with euphoria.\n
				desc = sex_transition_73
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 78
				}
				# Lie Face Down
				# His rod gets even harder as his relentless pounding reaches your deepest spot, your mind #bold overwhelmed#! by the euphoria.\n
				desc = sex_transition_78
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10069
				}
				# 69: EventsSex.MISSIONARY -> EventsSex.HOTDOG_ON_TOP failed
				# You grab [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] as he's recovering from a thrust and manage to get on your side, but he grabs and puts you back down.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10069
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10072
				}
				# 72: EventsSex.MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS failed
				# "Not inside!" you barely blurt out between moans and labored breaths, but your pleas falls on deaf ears.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10072
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10074
				}
				# 74: EventsSex.MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.CREAMPIE_KEEP failed
				# You try to wrap your legs and arms around him, but his wild thrusting makes it impossible to hold on.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10074
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10075
				}
				# 75: EventsSex.PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.MISSIONARY failed
				# You try to roll in place, but [affairs_partner.GetFirstName]'s paralyzing barrage of thrusts never slows enough to do so.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10075
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10077
				}
				# 77: EventsSex.PRONE_BONE -> EventsCum.PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS failed
				# "Not inside!" you barely blurt out between moans and labored breaths, but your pleas falls on deaf ears.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10077
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 14
			}
			# defaulted to 73: EventsSex.MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.CREAMPIE_BRED
			desc = sex_transition_73
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 15
			}
			# defaulted to 78: EventsSex.PRONE_BONE -> EventsCum.CREAMPIE_BRED
			desc = sex_transition_78
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.10.desc.0
		desc = LIDAc.10.desc.1
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAc.10.desc.2
		}
		desc = LIDAc.10.desc.3
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom >= 10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.10.desc.4
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom >= 20
			}
			desc = LIDAc.10.desc.5
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom > -10 && scope:subdom < 10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.10.desc.6
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom <= -10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.10.desc.7
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom <= -20
			}
			desc = LIDAc.10.desc.8
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom
			}
			desc = LIDAc.10.desc.9
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -3
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 45.0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 30
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 30
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.89
	}
}
LIDAc.11 = {
	# CREAMPIE_KEEP: Taking It Home
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.11.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = ecstasy
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = shock
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 74
				}
				# Lie on Your Back
				# You wrap your legs and arms around him...\n
				desc = sex_transition_74
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10069
				}
				# 69: EventsSex.MISSIONARY -> EventsSex.HOTDOG_ON_TOP failed
				# You grab [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] as he's recovering from a thrust and manage to get on your side, but he grabs and puts you back down.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10069
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10072
				}
				# 72: EventsSex.MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS failed
				# "Not inside!" you barely blurt out between moans and labored breaths, but your pleas falls on deaf ears.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10072
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10074
				}
				# 74: EventsSex.MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.CREAMPIE_KEEP failed
				# You try to wrap your legs and arms around him, but his wild thrusting makes it impossible to hold on.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10074
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 14
			}
			# defaulted to 74: EventsSex.MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.CREAMPIE_KEEP
			desc = sex_transition_74
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.11.desc.0
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom < 10
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.1
		}
		desc = LIDAc.11.desc.2
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.3
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom
			}
			desc = LIDAc.11.desc.4
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 1
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 60
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		random = {
			chance = 20
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 20
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.90
	}
}
